metadata.name: BEGINNING
metadata.description:
"BEGINNING" is a work of art that showcases the stylistic language of Kx art in a yellow manner, marking a new beginning. 

An open edition, open within a 3 day minting window (from 5 pm CET / Dec 19-22th, 2022) 

This edition is meant to be enjoyed as art - it provides an accessible entry to collecting my work. 

Duration: 3 days 

Burn mechanism: Burn 2 editions to get a new piece  | Collect 3 editions: You have a chance to win my 1/1 
Additional: 3 editions count as one chance, meaning that if you buy 6 editions, you will have two chances in the raffle to win the 1/1, and so on.

Owners of this artwork minted here will receive a 3d mint as an additional utility until December 29 - on objkt.com so that you can place it in your virtual gallery.

 Only by finding the beginning of everything, you can fully understand your own nature
